messages.subject: Happy Birthday Ang was Re: unschool math
messages.msgSnippet: ... Happy birth-day to you Happy birth-day to you Happy birth-day dear Ang Happy birth-day to you!! :o) ... We deny you nothing. ;-) We celebrate the miracle
messages.messageBody:
>>Today is my un-birthday.>>

Happy birth-day to you
Happy birth-day to you
Happy birth-day dear Ang
Happy birth-day to you!! :o)

>>I am a leapyear baby, and even though I have been alive 31 calendar years,
>>I get denied having a birthday today.>>

We deny you nothing. ;-) We celebrate the miracle and blessing of your
birth. We celebrate your 31 years of life. We celebrate You.

Life is good.
~Mary
